H4853.def: literally: lifting up (one's) self; hence: = action by which humans turn to (other) humans with the confidence that they will find joy and comfort there

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H2372.def: = process by which someone perceives an important object with the eyes, or witnesses an event of some significance

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H5251.def: = a distinctive object in the form of a flag or board attached to a stick, or a metal device or image fitted on the end of a pole; ► normally used to identify a particular group, or as a rallying point for soldiers in war; ≈ often used figuratively to denote an example, or a person or deity that one can rely on, or something that shows the way

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H5130.def: = action by which humans hold an object in their hands and move it to and fro, ► probably in order to signal to a deity that the object in their hands is intended for them

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H6607.def: literally: opening up of words; hence: = causative process by which deities make words easier to understand

H5081.def: = state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H1346.def: = state in which a substance increases in volume, which manifests itself in an increasing height

H1995.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, sometimes associated with natural phenomena like heavy rain and the waves of a stormy sea

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H1823.def: = state in which objects are, or are perceived as having something in common with other objects

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H7588.def: = process by which turbulent waters produce a loud and intimidating noise

H4467.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H6485.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe a person, group, or object ► with the purpose of determining their well-being, condition, and/or integrity

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H4801.def: = state in which humans, deities, objects, or events are located in a place that is at a relatively great distance from the point of reference

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H2195.def: = action by which humans or deities express their intense anger; ◄ caused by someone else's behavior, ► almost invariably resulting in punishment for the party that is responsible

H3213.def: = action by which humans utter a high-pitched cry to give expression to an emotion, which is usually grief or distress, but can also be triumph and glee

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7701.def: = action by which humans or wild animals attack other humans and kill, destroy and steal in the process

H7706.def: = deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All-sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H3824.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H4549.def: = process by which substances become soft, ◄ often as a result of  a higher temperature

H926.def: = action by which humans or divine beings act quickly

H6735.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing in the form of an image or a drawing; ► functioning in non-sanctioned rituals or as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H2342.def: = action by which humans delay action until the right moment, with a certain amount of confidence that this moment will actually come

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H394.def: = pertaining to being without mercy towards humans and animals

H2740.def: = process by which objects become extremely dry ► and therefore highly inflammable

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H8047.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H8045.def: = causative action by which humans, deities, or events completely remove humans, animals, or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment

H2400.def: = state in which a human being is responsible for a specified or implied offence, ► which results in a state of guilt which may require atonement, restitution, and retribution

H3556.def: = celestial body, providing light, and assisting the sun and moon in ruling day and night; ◄ created and controled by the divine; ≈ associated with a high and elevated position and sometimes personified as creatures that can sing and wage war

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H3685.def: = state of absence of wisdom, which manifests itself in excessive anger, talking too rashly and too much, sinful behavior, and laziness, ► and results in poverty, shame, punishment, and trouble and grief for other people; ≈ foolishness is thought to reside in a person's {L:heart<SDBH:לֵב>}; the behavior and treatment of fools is often compared to that of animals

H1984.def: = process by which an object emits or reflects light; ≈ regarded as awesome

H216.def: = light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H8121.def: = celestial body ► that marks day and night and produces warmth and light for the earth

H2821.def: = process by which the light gradually disappears, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars can no longer reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, death, and lack of enlightenment

H3394.def: = one of the celestial bodies which govern time, seasons and other events on earth, marked by a white and cold light and seen by night

H5050.def: = process by which an object gives out or reflects a bright light

H6485.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe a person, group, or object ► with the purpose of determining their well-being, condition, and/or integrity

H8398.def: primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans

H7563.def: = state in which a person's behavior is inconsistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H5771.def: = a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment

H7673.def: = process by which an activity comes to an end

H1347.def: = dense growth of shrubbery or small trees, habitat of animals

H2086.def: = state in which humans have an exalted status in their own eyes, resulting in a failure to see the limits of what is permitted or appropriate in view of one's status, and act accordingly; ≈ often associated with sin, aggression, and rebellion against God

H1346.def: = state in which a substance increases in volume, which manifests itself in an increasing height

H6184.def: = state in which a person is a strong and powerful enemy, who is thinks high of himself and is prone to violence, and usually does not fear God

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H3365.def: = state in which humans are valuable and worthy of respect in the eyes of others

H6337.def: = {L:gold<SDBH:זָהָב>} refined to a high level of purity; ≈ considered rare, beautiful and very valuable

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H211.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Joktan<SDBH:יָקְטָן>}; descendant of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as the founder of a people living in a region with the same name

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H7264.def: = process by which humans or objects shake involuntarily; ◄ typically as a result of fear, insecurity, shock, excitement, or other emotions

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2740.def: = process by which objects become extremely dry ► and therefore highly inflammable

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H5080.def: = state in which one's hand, which holds an instrument like an axe, is raised ► with the purpose of striking it against another object

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H6437.def: = action by which humans or animals turn their body to face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H5127.def: = action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H1856.def: = causative action by which humans thrust violently against other humans with a sharp weapon, ► with the aim of wounding them or ending their lives

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H7693.def: = action by which a man has sexual intercourse with a woman, whether with her consent or not; ≈ this is possibly a rather explicit term which could have been considered offensive by some people

22.gl: to lie with > to sleep with

H5782.def: = process by which someone wakes up from his sleep

H4074.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Japheth<SDBH:יֶפֶת>}; ► regarded as the founder of the Medians

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H2803.def: = action by which humans exercise their {L:mind<SDBH:לֵב>} with regard to something

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H2654.def: = state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H7198.def: = a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

H5288.def: = a young male, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people; ≈ typically regarded as healthy and physically strong, but also lacking the experience and wisdom of the {L:older men<SDBH:זָקֵן>}

H7355.def: = state in which humans feel affection for others

H6529.def: = produce from crop-bearing trees and plants

H990.def: = front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects

H2347.def: = state in which humans or deities are unwilling to do something that may have a negative effect on someone or something else; ◄ usually caused by an emotion of affection or compassion

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H4467.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H1347.def: = dense growth of shrubbery or small trees, habitat of animals

H3778.def: exact meaning unknown; = class of persons skilled in magic and soothsaying; ◄ found in {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>}

H4114.def: = causative action by which humans or deities destroy an object completely ◄ as if by turning it completely upside down

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5467.def: = town; ◄ located near {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}; ► town where {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} settled, when he separated himself from {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; destroyed with {L:Gomorrah<SDBH:עֲמֹרָה>}

H5331.def: poetic term: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, usually in the future

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H167.def: = to set up one's tents in a certain location ► with the purpose of settling there for a certain amount of time

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H6728.def: = boat of a relatively large size; ► able to sail the sea and ocean

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H255.def: = animal that produces mournful sounds; ≈ associated with death, destruction, and devastation

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3284.def: exact meaning unknown; probably: = a type of owl, large, standing over 75 centimeters (30 inches) tall; it has a pale fawn color, is spotted, has ear tufts, and is best known by its loud, deep hooting at night; it roosts by day in deep shade in acacia trees, caves, tombs, and ruined buildings; it feeds on small mammals, including hares, baby gazelles, lambs, rats and mice, and large roosting birds, especially wild and domestic ducks; ◄ Bubo bubo; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten

H8163.def: = a fairly small, male domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and long hair, and usually found in one single {L:flock<SDBH:צֹאן>} with sheep; ► raised for its hair, often used for sacrifices; a clean animal, and therefore to be eaten

H7540.def: = action with which humans or animals move in a quick and light or lively way

H338.def: = area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H490.def: = woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

H8577.def: = mythical sea monster, such as {L:behemoth<SDBH:בְּהֵמֹות>} and {L:leviathan<SDBH:לִוְיָתָן>}

H1964.def: = a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H4900.def: = state in which humans are of more than average height{N:001}
